---
title: "Running R Analysis Code"
author: "Baobao Zhang"
date: "July 1, 2015"
output: pdf_document
---

We knit to show the output of running the analysis code.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(dev = 'pdf')
```

```{r, fig.height=3.5}
library(confounding)
# return results
survey4_analyze(output_print = TRUE)
```

```{r, fig.height=10}
# return main coefficient plot
survey4_analyze(output_print = FALSE, return_main = TRUE)
```
